name: [LD46] No Way Back
description:
Here is my first Ludum Dare attempt using Unity.

Sources: https://github.com/alexbljack/ludum-dare-46

The game is infinite runner with indirect controls where player as a commander have to lead a soldier to the enemy territory as long as possible.

As I'm still a very bad artist all assets and fonts (excluding some sprites) are downloaded.

Thanks these guys for providing free and awesome graphics!

  • https://secrethideout.itch.io/team-wars-platformer-battle
  • https://kvsr.itch.io/background-set-pixel-assets
  •  https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/ui-pixel-art-01
  • https://villaniouscat.itch.io/cake-coloured-buttons
  • https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
